summary: A text file to be used as a batch command for ALL skyrim ingredients*
descriptionHtml:
I looked far and wide to find a file that contained all the alchemy ingredients with all DLC installed ready to be used as a batch command in game and could not find one. I spent the time and compiled this list.

All skyrim alchemical ingredients are contained in this file excluding crimson nirnroot and unique quest specific ingredients.

-must have all DLC addons for all items to work
-quantities of Vanilla ingredients are set to 10
-quantities of Dawnguard ingredients set at 11 to easily spot in text file if you wish to change
-quantities of Dragonborn ingredients set to 12 ^^

To use: Extract the file into your Skyrim directory
Name text file your desired name
In game open the console and type Bat "Name of the text file" (without quotes) and hit enter.
Enjoy!
author: Thelmaryn
